verses.verse: An oracle: <S%H4853><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to Israel <S%H3478><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Malachi. <S%H4401><s%>

"I have loved <S%H157><s%> you, <S%H5002><s%>" says Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Yet you say, <S%H559><s%> "How have you loved <S%H157><s%> us? <S%H6215><s%>" "Wasn't Esau Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s brother? <S%H251><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "Yet I loved <S%H157><s%> Jacob; <S%H3290><s%>

but Esau <S%H6215><s%> I hated, <S%H8130><s%> and made <S%H7760><s%> his mountains <S%H2022><s%> a desolation, <S%H8077><s%> and gave his heritage <S%H5159><s%> to the jackals <S%H8568><s%> of the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>"

Whereas Edom <S%H123><s%> says, <S%H559><s%> "We are beaten <S%H7567><s%> down, <S%H7725><s%> but we will return and build <S%H1129><s%> the waste places; <S%H2723><s%>" thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> "They shall build, <S%H1129><s%> but I will throw down; <S%H2040><s%> and men will call <S%H7121><s%> them <S%H7564><s%> 'The Wicked Land, <S%H1366><s%>' even the people <S%H5971><s%> against whom Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shows wrath <S%H2194><s%> <S%H99999><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>"
Your eyes <S%H5869><s%> will see, <S%H7200><s%> and you will say, <S%H559><s%> "Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is great <S%H1431><s%>â€” even beyond the border <S%H1366><s%> of Israel! <S%H3478><s%>"

"A son <S%H1121><s%> honors <S%H3513><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> and a servant <S%H5650><s%> his master. <S%H113><s%> If I am a father, <S%H1><s%> then where is my honor? <S%H3519><s%> And if I am a master, <S%H113><s%> where is the respect <S%H4172><s%> due me? <S%H559><s%> Says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> to you, <S%H3548><s%> priests, who despise <S%H959><s%> my name. <S%H8034><s%> You say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H959><s%> 'How have we despised your name? <S%H8034><s%>'

You offer <S%H5066><s%> polluted <S%H1351><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> on my altar. <S%H4196><s%> You say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H1351><s%> 'How have we polluted you? <S%H559><s%>' In that you say, <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh's table <S%H7979><s%> contemptible. <S%H959><s%>'

When you offer <S%H5066><s%> the blind <S%H5787><s%> for sacrifice, <S%H2076><s%> isn't <S%H7451><s%> that evil? And when you offer <S%H5066><s%> the lame <S%H6455><s%> and sick, <S%H2470><s%> isn't <S%H7451><s%> that evil? Present <S%H7126><s%> it now to your governor! <S%H6346><s%> Will he be pleased <S%H7521><s%> with you? <S%H5375><s%> Or will he accept your person? <S%H6440><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

"Now, <S%H2470><s%> please entreat the favor of God, <S%H410><s%> that he may be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to us. <S%H3027><s%> With this, will he accept <S%H5375><s%> any of you? <S%H6440><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

"Oh that there were one among you who would shut <S%H5462><s%> the doors, <S%H1817><s%> that you might not kindle <S%H215><s%> fire on my altar <S%H4196><s%> in vain! <S%H2600><s%> I have no pleasure <S%H2656><s%> in you, <S%H559><s%>" says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> "neither will I accept <S%H7521><s%> an offering <S%H4503><s%> at your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

For from the rising <S%H4217><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%> even to the going down <S%H3996><s%> of the same, <S%H8034><s%> my name is great <S%H1419><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and in every place <S%H4725><s%> incense <S%H6999><s%> will be offered <S%H5066><s%> to my name, <S%H8034><s%> and a pure <S%H2889><s%> offering: <S%H4503><s%> for my name <S%H8034><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

"But you profane <S%H2490><s%> it, <S%H559><s%> in that you say, <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh's table <S%H7979><s%> is polluted, <S%H1351><s%> and its fruit, <S%H5108><s%> even its food, <S%H400><s%> is contemptible. <S%H959><s%>'

You say <S%H559><s%> also, <S%H4972><s%> 'Behold, what a weariness it is! <S%H5301><s%>' and you have sniffed at it, <S%H559><s%>" says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies; <S%H6635><s%> "and you have brought <S%H935><s%> that which was taken by violence, <S%H1497><s%> the lame, <S%H6455><s%> and the sick; <S%H2470><s%> thus you bring <S%H935><s%> the offering. <S%H4503><s%> Should I accept <S%H7521><s%> this at your hand? <S%H3027><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

"But the deceiver <S%H5230><s%> is cursed, <S%H779><s%> who <S%H3426><s%> has in his flock <S%H5739><s%> a male, <S%H2145><s%> and vows, <S%H5087><s%> and sacrifices <S%H2076><s%> to the Lord <S%H136><s%> a blemished thing; <S%H7843><s%> for I am a great <S%H1419><s%> King, <S%H4428><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> "and my name <S%H8034><s%> is awesome <S%H3372><s%> among the nations. <S%H1471><s%>"
